Package org.apache.hivemind.impl

Class Summary
AttributeImpl Implementation of Attribute.
CountFactory Simple factory that uses dynamic proxies to count the number of times methods in interfaces it has enhanced have been executed.
DefaultsSymbolSource Implementation of SymbolSource driven off of an extension point.
ElementImpl Implementation of Element.
FactoryDefault Default symbol value defined by the hivemind.FactoryDefaults extension point.
HivemoduleProvider Implementation of RegistryProvider that loads all xml modules defined in META-INF/hivemodule.xml files.
InvokeFactoryInterceptorConstructor Constructs a new interceptor by invoking methods on another service (which implements the ServiceInterceptorFactory interface.
InvokeFactoryServiceConstructor Constructs a new service by invoking methods on another service (which implements the ServiceImplementationFactory interface.
SchemaAssignment Helper class used during the processing of xml descriptors.
SchemaProcessorImpl Used to assemble all the data contributed to an ConfigurationPoint while converting the XML (represented as Elements into Java objects.
ServiceImplementationFactoryParametersImpl Wrapper around a ServicePoint and a List of parameters, passed to a ServiceImplementationFactory.
SymbolExpanderImpl A simple parser used to identify symbols in a string and expand them via a SymbolSource.
SymbolSourceContribution Contribution to the org.apache.hivemind.SymbolSource configuration extension point; used to provide a SymbolSource implementation (often, as a service defined in HiveMind itself), and advice on ordering the service.
SystemPropertiesSymbolSource Implementation of SymbolSource that accesses System.getProperty(java.lang.String).
TranslatorContribution A contribution to the hivemind.Translators configuration point.
TranslatorManagerImpl Implementation of TranslatorManager
XmlCoreServicesProvider Implementation of RegistryProvider that defines core services needed by the xml implementation.
XmlExtensionResolver Resolves the unresolved extensions in all xml modules of a RegistryDefinition.
XmlModuleDescriptorProcessor Adds the modules held by instances of ModuleDescriptor to a RegistryDefinition.
XmlModuleReader Reads a hivemind xml module into a RegistryDefinition.
